** Would you like to see this house at your convenience? Questions? Email, text, or call us! **
This is a RENOVATED 2 1/2-bedroom house in South Philadelphia. Originally prepared for sale, it has a Stainless & granite kitchen and new hardwood floors throughout! Walk to great neighborhood restaurants, bakeries & delis. The location is one block south of Snyder Avenue at 12th Street. Less than a five minute walk to the heart of E Passyunk Avenue!
1141 Cantrell Street
East Passyunk Crossing / Center City South / South Philadelphia / South Broad Street
Philadelphia 19148
Monthly Rent: $1695
Utilities: Gas, Electric & Water on your own meters
Initial Payment: 1st, Last & Security
Pets: Cat or small dog OK w/pet addendum and deposit
Lease Agreement: 1 year lease, then month-to-month with Winter term
The area: You're in a great, classic South Philly neighborhood. Walk 1 1/2 blocks to 10th Street and a vintage, still-operating Italian bakery. Don't miss the Zagat-rated Italian red sauce joint Bomb Bomb Bar-B-Q Grill at 1026 Wolf St. Walk just 2 blocks west to South Broad Street for the Broad St/Snyder Ave subway station. Also, right here is the beginning of the hip E Passyunk Avenue dining and shopping district. For more details about the immediate and adjacent neighborhood and ALL the great restaurants and other amenities within 5-10 minutes of the house, just search at Yelp with the location "1141 Cantrell Street, Philadelphia, PA 19148"
Building Exterior: The original brick front and top cornice have been renewed to highlight original detail. 6-lite glass / solid wood front door accentuates the original vestibule. Four lined metal-wire window boxes complement the exterior character.
Living/Dining Room: Open the front door into a marble-floored vestibule with tiled walls. A modern mini-chandelier provides comfortable lighting. Enter the main living/dining room through a glass inner vestibule door. The floor is solid bamboo. Window treatments in the living room (and throughout the house) are white mini blinds. There's a ceiling fan and light in the dining room area. Patterned custom carpeting covers the stairs leading to the second floor.
Kitchen: Stainless and granite. There are 3 separate granite countertops, a gas stainless range (with microwave/range hood mounted overhead) + a Maytag refrigerator & dishwasher. Ceramic Italian tile on the floor. Ikea cabinets including wall-mounted cabinet with aluminum frames & glass doors.
Front Bedroom: Large bedroom features hardwood floors and ceiling fan. Two south-facing windows let in lots of light + big full-wall closet for clothes & storage.
Middle Bedroom: This room has solid wood flooring and a ceiling fan. An opaque glass door opens into a small half-bedroom that can be used for a small home office or walk-in closet.
Bathroom: The bathroom includes replacement fixtures, tile floor and tile walls. The bathtub, medicine cabinet, vanity and modern wall sconce are recent upgrades too. Behind the bathtub, the original linen closet was refurbished.
Basement: Includes a full-sized washer & dryer + mechanicals. This is a full basement running from the front of the property to the back under the kitchen.
Backyard/Patio: Fence paneling provides privacy. The back of the house is painted.
Questions? Please contact us from this listing.

title: beautiful 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home
description:
Rittenhouse square location and private gated parking! This beautiful 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home is defined by style, elegance and charm. Located in a classic brownstone on pine st., the building was meticulously renovated in 2015 to ensure all of its former character was maintained, while making room for four (4) fully renovated contemporary units. Unit a, which comes with its own private parking, is the largest of the four units and is perfectly situated at the front of this historic building featuring beautiful large windows that infuse the first floor and large master bedroom with light year-round and offer an an idyllic, classic philadelphia view of the lovely tree-lined block. Plus, it is in a hard-to-beat location just a few minutes away from the theatre district & rittenhouse square, yet still on a quiet and peaceful residential street, across the street from the best place in the city to get a cappuccino! 1508 pine st. Boasts ample living & dining spaces for all of your family & friends to enjoy. Enter through the main level, which has a spacious living area and dining room, a beautiful brick fireplace and a lovely powder room. Upstairs there are two generous bedrooms, each on their own level for optimal privacy and both equipped with their own private, luxurious tiled bathrooms with luxurious tile tub surrounds, tile floor and custom vanity. Down on the lower level, you will find a large family room and designer kitchen with travertine floors throughout. The kitchen features sleek, modern cabinetry, quartz countertops, and new premium appliances including a viking microwave, viking gas range, whirlpool refrigerator, and bosch dishwasher. High ceilings and plenty of windows flood this home with light and give it a bright, open and airy atmosphere, while classic architectural features like the brick fireplace, natural wood accents, and beautiful intricate moldings give it a warm and inviting feel. Not to mention the private gated parking located in the back of the property, laundry in-unit (+ brand new samsung washer & dryer) and an additional storage locker in the basement make this home as convenient as it is luxurious. Don't miss out on this incredible space close to rittenhouse square park, broad street, jefferson, upenn, and the cityã¢â€â™s finest restaurants, boutiques, and more! title: Newly Renovated 3-Bedroom Townhouse with Finished Basement & Home Gym
description:
This 3-Bedroom/3-Bathroom Townhouse has been completely renovated and looks absolutely stunning! Located in the Cobbs Creek neighborhood of West Philadelphia, this home offers easy access to Chestnut Street, Walnut Street, Baltimore Ave, and the Market-Frankford line which make commuting to UPenn, Drexel, and Center City a breeze.
Entrance into the home leads you into a foyer which can be used as a seating area, mud room, or even a home office. It leads into the living room, complete with wide-plank hardwood flooring that flows continuously into the dining area and kitchen.  The kitchen is modern with gray shaker-style cabinets with brushed nickel hardware, white quartz countertops, stainless steel refrigerator, a four-burner gas range, a microwave, and dishwasher, and a custom tile backsplash that brings the entire design together! The bedrooms include ample closet space and large windows which allow plenty of natural light to pour in. The master bedroom is very spacious and can fit a king-sized bed and a complete bedroom set with ease! There is also a private master bathroom which includes stone tile flooring, modern vanity with decorative light fixture, a shower stall with tile base, and an incredible tile surround that extends from floor to ceiling!
Work out before work or class from the comfort of your home! The basement is completely finished with a full bathroom, a home gym, and an additional bonus room that can be used as an additional living room or playroom. The home gym comes equipped with full-length mirrors, padded floors, a boxing bag, a treadmill, a Bowflex, and an elliptical.  There is also a balcony off of the kitchen and a patio off of the basement which are the perfect spots for outdoor relaxation and grilling!
Tenant is responsible for electric, gas, water, and cable/internet in addition to rent each month.
Application Qualifications: Minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant’s portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, acceptable credit history, and acceptable criminal history. More specific information provided with the application.

title: This beautiful 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home
description:
Rittenhouse square location and private gated parking! This beautiful 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home is defined by style, elegance and charm. Located in a classic brownstone on pine st., the building was meticulously renovated in 2015 to ensure all of its former character was maintained, while making room for four (4) fully renovated contemporary units. Unit a, which comes with its own private parking, is the largest of the four units and is perfectly situated at the front of this historic building featuring beautiful large windows that infuse the first floor and large master bedroom with light year-round and offer an an idyllic, classic philadelphia view of the lovely tree-lined block. Plus, it is in a hard-to-beat location just a few minutes away from the theatre district & rittenhouse square, yet still on a quiet and peaceful residential street, across the street from the best place in the city to get a cappuccino! 1508 pine st. Boasts ample living & dining spaces for all of your family & friends to enjoy. Enter through the main level, which has a spacious living area and dining room, a beautiful brick fireplace and a lovely powder room. Upstairs there are two generous bedrooms, each on their own level for optimal privacy and both equipped with their own private, luxurious tiled bathrooms with luxurious tile tub surrounds, tile floor and custom vanity. Down on the lower level, you will find a large family room and designer kitchen with travertine floors throughout. The kitchen features sleek, modern cabinetry, quartz countertops, and new premium appliances including a viking microwave, viking gas range, whirlpool refrigerator, and bosch dishwasher. High ceilings and plenty of windows flood this home with light and give it a bright, open and airy atmosphere, while classic architectural features like the brick fireplace, natural wood accents, and beautiful intricate moldings give it a warm and inviting feel. Not to mention the private gated parking located in the back of the property, laundry in-unit (+ brand new samsung washer & dryer) and an additional storage locker in the basement make this home as convenient as it is luxurious. Don't miss out on this incredible space close to rittenhouse square park, broad street, jefferson, upenn, and the cityã¢â€â™s finest restaurants, boutiques, and more! description:

This spacious 2 bed, 1.5 bath offers plenty of living space and has a perfect garden space for outdoor entertaining. Enter the unit from your private access alley into the main living space which features a large kitchen with eat-in bar, convenient half bath, 10+ foot ceilings, and large floor-to-ceiling windows that let in tons of natural light. title: Welcome to the ellington 10d
description:
Step outside to endless options for your every need! Welcome to the ellington 10d. This one-bedroom, one-bathroom condo combines great open space with lots of natural light and modern amenities. A beautiful white kitchen with granite counters, features stainless upgraded appliances and leads to a spacious living area with high ceilings and sleek wood floors. The bedroom is oversized and the sunny window nook is the perfect place for a home office or relaxing seating area. A spacious bathroom is outfitted in marble, and has a combination tub and shower. In-unit laundry is located just off of the kitchen area, and ample storage is found throughout. The ellington offers a resident’s lounge, 24-hour doorperson, on-site fitness center, and is conveniently located just steps from incredible dining options like mission, giuseppe & sons, harp & crown, oyster house, del frisco’s, and so many more. Enjoy the surrounding rittenhouse shopping district, and enjoy the conveniences of nearby public transportation and nightlife. Enjoy this incredible value while it lasts, whether for yourself, or as an investment opportunity!
1500 chestnut st #10d

title: Set your appointment today!
description:
A great opportunity to live in this large beautiful home in an amazing neighborhood! The home has five bedrooms and three full bathrooms. On a unique street, this home has a charming rarely found front yard. A traditional home with many original details yet upgraded recently with quality and taste. The living room has a working fireplace and hardwood floors. Updated kitchen with an attractive countertop, backsplash, and appliances. The first floor full bathroom has an original clawfoot tub. The back first-floor room would work well as an office space. The second floor has three bedrooms with the second-floor bathroom being upgraded with a whirlpool tub. Each bedroom has original finishes. The third floor has two bedrooms. The middle bedroom was converted into a large closet and laundry room with high efficient washer and dryer. The back bedroom has sliding glass doors with the full bathroom also having a whirlpool tub. The basement is large but unfinished. There is good ceiling height in the basement if you choose to finish it. The home is approximately 1800 square feet. Set your appointment today!

title: Welcome to this updated multi level unit
description:
Welcome to this updated multi level unit with 4 bedrooms and 2 full baths, conveniently located with easy access to center city, fairmount, and temple university. The eat-in kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a window overlooking the back patio area. With ample closet space in each of the 4 bedrooms, a designated basement storage space, washer and dryer, and central a/c, this is the perfect place for roommates or a small family. Within walking distance are many neighborhood favorites like, thirsty dice, bar hygge, santucci's, and osteria.
